Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-25032 affecting package openjdk8 for versions less than 1.8.0.332-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-25032 affecting package openjdk8 for versions less than 1.8.0.332-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openjdk8 is earlier than 1.8.0.332-2, affected by CVE-2018-25032
